name: Green Wounds (itch)
description:
Your wounds are fresh and it's time you got revenge...

Green wounds is a RPG where you play as an exiled thief seeking revenge from a merciless king. Collect resources, fight enemies, craft new weapons and tools, explore the unknown, and uncover hidden truths about the world you are living in. 

Gather resources from collecting them around the world, mining them out of ores and trees, or having your villagers find them for you automatically. Use resources to craft new tools, weapons, consumables and other items that you will find useful throughout your journey. Talk to NPC's to learn more about the world and gain new and unique items and abilities. Fight beasts and monsters hiding out in the woods or even knights and kings. Uncover religions and cults in order to piece together the history of the land and maybe even take it over for yourself...

FEATURES:

  • Collect Resources from chopping trees, mining rocks, etc...
  • Craft new tools, weapons, and items
  • Manage resources generated by a team of villagers at your disposal
  • Explore a vast map that takes you to various locations
  • Interact with and talk to NPC's
  • Fight enemies by clicking on equipped weapons and items
